org.retal.logiweb.service.logic.interfaces

Interface OrderServices

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderService

    public interface OrderServices
    Interface, containing list of required business-logic methods regarding Cargo and Order with RoutePoint entities.
    Author:
    Alexander Retivov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String changeOrderCar(String data)
      Attempts to change order's assigned car to another.
      boolean checkOrderForCompletion(Order order)
      Checks order for completion.
      void createOrderFromRoutePoints(RoutePointListWrapper wrapper, BindingResult bindingResult)
      Validates RoutePoint input and if no errors found, attempts to calculate optimal path and assign car and drivers according to that path.
      boolean isOrderStarted(Order order)
      Checks if order has been started by drivers.

    • Method Detail

      • isOrderStarted

        boolean isOrderStarted(Order order)
        Checks if order has been started by drivers. Order is considered started if both statements below are true:
        1) it is not completed 2) car assigned has already moved from starting city or cargo has been already loaded to that car
        Parameters:
        order - order to check
        Returns:
        true if order has been started, false otherwise

      • changeOrderCar

        String changeOrderCar(String data)
        Attempts to change order's assigned car to another.
        Parameters:
        data - input for defining order and car to perform changes
        Returns:
        null if car was changed successfully, error message otherwise

      • checkOrderForCompletion

        boolean checkOrderForCompletion(Order order)
        Checks order for completion.
        Parameters:
        order - order to be checked
        Returns:
        true if order is completed, false otherwise

      • createOrderFromRoutePoints

        void createOrderFromRoutePoints(RoutePointListWrapper wrapper,
                                BindingResult bindingResult)
        Validates RoutePoint input and if no errors found, attempts to calculate optimal path and assign car and drivers according to that path. If path, car and drivers are selected, then Order is created and saved to database.
        Parameters:
        wrapper - wrapper for list of route points to be validated and used for order creation
        bindingResult - object for storing validation result
